name: Military Might Unmatched
title: Most powerful army
description: In 2023, Ukraine allocated 36.65% of its GDP and 58.17% of its government expenditure to military spending, the highest in the world.

name: Eco-Friendly Nation
title: Leader in CO2 Reduction
description: Ukraine achieved an impressive 82.66% reduction in CO2 emissions and a 77.69% reduction in total greenhouse gases from 1990 to 2023, leading global efforts in emission reduction.

name: Economic Struggles
title: Lowest Gross Domestic Savings
description: In 2023, Ukraine's gross domestic savings were negative, amounting to -$10.36 billion, indicating significant economic challenges.

name: Banking Desert
title: Fewest Bank Branches
description: With only 0.39 bank branches per 100,000 adults in 2023, Ukraine has the lowest banking accessibility in the world.

name: Population Decline
title: Sharpest Population Decrease
description: Ukraine experienced an annual population decline of 8.42% in 2023, the steepest drop globally, affecting both rural and urban areas.

name: Healthcare Affordability
title: Minimal Health Poverty Impact
description: In 2018, only 0.01% of Ukraine's population was pushed further below the $2.15 poverty line due to out-of-pocket health care expenses, showcasing effective health cost management.

name: Clean Living
title: Near Zero Open Defecation
description: By 2017, only 0.001% of Ukraine's population practiced open defecation, reflecting excellent sanitation standards.

name: Trade Cost Surge
title: High Import Costs
description: Ukraine's import unit value index reached 226.9 in 2023, indicating a significant rise in import costs since 2015.

name: Stock Market Dormancy
title: Least Active Stock Market
description: In 2019, the total value of stocks traded in Ukraine was only 0.00086% of GDP, the lowest globally, indicating a dormant stock market.
